tagline.title: KINTAMANI TANAH LOT TOUR IS A ONE DAY TRIP WE DESIGNED TO ENJOY VISITING KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH SPECTACULAR VOLCANO VIEW AND THEN VISIT THE TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.text: KINTAMANI TANAH LOT TOUR IS A ONE DAY TRIP WE DESIGNED TO ENJOY VISITING KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH SPECTACULAR VOLCANO VIEW AND THEN VISIT THE TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.html: KINTAMANI TANAH LOT TOUR IS A ONE DAY TRIP WE DESIGNED TO ENJOY VISITING KINTAMANI VILLAGE WITH SPECTACULAR VOLCANO VIEW AND THEN VISIT THE TANAH LOT TEMPLE

description.text: Bali Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour is part of Bali Full Day Tour Packages we designed to put two famous tourism site in single day tour, this tour will enjoy visiting the spectacular view of mount batur volcano at kintamani village and then continue to visit the beautiful Tanah Lot Temple. One day tour to visit 2 very famous tourist attractions, namely visiting Kintamani with stunning views of Mount Batur and Lake Batur and ending with visiting Tanah Lot Temple which is very famous for its sunset views, first we will go to Batubulan Village to see Barong and Barong performances. Keris dance for an hour with a story told about the battle between good and evil, continued to visit the Tegalalang rice terrace with a view of the rice fields that is so enchantingly beautiful, followed by visiting Kintamani Village with a very beautiful view of Mount Batur and we will enjoy lunch at Kintamani village, while having lunch you can see the view of Mount Batur and Lake Batur, continue to visit Taman Ayun Temple is a village temple located in Mengwi Village which has a high historical value for the development of Hindus in Bali, and ends with a m visit the Tanah Lot Temple which is uniquely located on the beach on a rock, and if the tide is high then this temple will look like it's floating, the view is more perfect with the sunset as the background, and proceed to take you back to the hotel with a a very memorable experience in this Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour, accompanied by an experienced and friendly driver will make the trip even more enjoyable

One day tour to visit 2 very famous tourist attractions, namely visiting Kintamani with stunning views of Mount Batur and Lake Batur and ending with visiting Tanah Lot Temple which is very famous for its sunset views, first we will go to Batubulan Village to see Barong and Barong performances. Keris dance for an hour with a story told about the battle between good and evil, continued to visit the Tegalalang rice terrace with a view of the rice fields that is so enchantingly beautiful, followed by visiting Kintamani Village with a very beautiful view of Mount Batur and we will enjoy lunch at Kintamani village, while having lunch you can see the view of Mount Batur and Lake Batur, continue to visit Taman Ayun Temple is a village temple located in Mengwi Village which has a high historical value for the development of Hindus in Bali, and ends with a m visit the Tanah Lot Temple which is uniquely located on the beach on a rock, and if the tide is high then this temple will look like it's floating, the view is more perfect with the sunset as the background, and proceed to take you back to the hotel with a a very memorable experience in this Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour, accompanied by an experienced and friendly driver will make the trip even more enjoyable

title.title: Barong and Keris Dance Performance | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Barong and Keris Dance Performance | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Barong dance performance with kris-wielding dancers and Rangda in Bali is traditional Balinese dance and perform very well Balinese dancer, take story from unended battle between the good and bad spirit. Barong is a protector spirit and Rangda is destroyer spirit. Barong figured with awesome fanged cover and long mane, he is the adversary of Rangda the witch, who administers over the spirits of obscurity. The Barong is often portrayed accompanied by two monkeys. Barong is portrayed as a lion with red head, covered in white thick fur, and wearing gilded jewelry adorned with pieces of mirrors.

title.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Tegalalang Rice Terrace | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tegalalang Rice Terrace is the beautiful rice terrace tourist attraction located in hill bank with spectacular view of rice paddy. Numerous vacationers who make a trip to and from Kintamani ceased at this spot to witness the excellence of the verdant terraced rice field landscape. The rice patio is planned exceptionally excellent with dazzling emptying rice field and accurately found on the slope bank. In this spot, you will see the Balinese agriculturist do their rice field in sideways zone complete with its framework watering system. You will appreciate the excellent scene of valley with rice porch and coconut trees decoration it.

title.title: Kintamani Village for Volcano View | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Kintamani Village for Volcano View | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kintamani Village is a name of wide open found in the slope and the wonderful display encompass it. We can see wonderful scene from Kintamani Village to diagram the dynamic abundance of Batur Mount and wide Lake of Batur in a valley. It is arranged in the level range with cool climate encompass it. When we remain up at Kintamani, we will have the capacity to see the rustic zone which is near to the lake. We can watch staggering characteristic landscape of Penelokan, a mix of Mount Batur and the spread of dark rock with Lake Batur and on a blue caldera.

title.title: Taman Ayun Temple | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour | Taman Ayun Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Taman Ayun Temple is located in Mengwi District and most popular site to visit. Amazing trip for explore the historical temple in mengwi village. This taman ayun temple is designed with Bali architecture, the form this temple building is also owns separate unique with up to 10 storeys . Taman Ayun Temple is built on the flat land with big fish pond surround it and it is looked like adrift on the water. Taman Ayun Temple is also considered to have historical values, which makes the regional government of Bali suggests the UNESCO in 2002 that this temple is included in World Heritage List.

title.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tanah Lot is a rock formation off the Indonesian island of Bali. It is home to the pilgrimage temple Pura Tanah Lot, a popular tourist and cultural icon for photography and general exoticism. Tanah Lot Temple is a Balinese Hindu sanctuary on the rock spotted amidst ocean. This temple is extremely excellent in the specific of the dusk time. We can see this temple from a few spot focuses with staggering perspective of the sea and nightfall. We will discover the temple a float on the seawater when the water is going tide on the grounds that this sanctuary will be encompassed by the seawater.

price.title: Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour Price :
price.content:
Kintamani and Tanah Lot Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer two price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Kintamani Besakih Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 650,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 950,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,2500,000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500,000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Lunch is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

IDR 750,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Ticket Barong Dance Performance + Lunch Indonesian Food + Mineral Water

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include lunch and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include lunch and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
